mapper.insert: INSERT INTO meal_item (session_id, name, count, calories, protein, assumption) VALUES (#{sessionId}, #{name}, #{count}, #{calories}, #{protein}, #{assumption})
mapper.select: SELECT id, session_id, name, count, calories, protein, assumption, created_at FROM meal_item WHERE session_id = #{sessionId} ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT COALESCE(SUM(calories), 0) AS total_calories, COALESCE(SUM(protein), 0) AS total_protein FROM meal_item WHERE session_id = #{sessionId}
